page.title: 15A Primary School Day
page.content: In school you learn alot of things.I like school,my teacher.Mr.Hamill takes us to the baths on Tuesdays.We all like going to the baths because it is a break from working.We go to Weston Point School.I have got four brothers and three sisters.We do different things at school,like maths,English,spellings,Topic,and Stories and Poems.I like maths the best because I like doing cards,also it is because it has time tables on the cards sometimes.My friend Lisa Wilkes likes English the best,because she likes the work in it.My friend Louise likes Stories And Poems the best because she likes making Poems.Two of my brothers are in my school,one of my brothers are in another school with my two sisters.One of my brothers and sisters have left school.
